div.p: Supermicro is seeking a Data Analysis Manager. The primary responsibility is to build the SMC product data library and make it ready for the on-line store. The candidate needs to understand SMC products and the overall server market. Additional duties include selecting key products, coordinating with other server product managers, compiling product data into database or rules, forecasting selling quantities, and communicating with developers to bring up on-line store.
Includes the following essential duties and responsibilities (other duties may also be assigned):

ul.li: Understand and analyze SMC and competitors' products and market trend
Choose the right products for the on-line store
Communicate with other product managers to understand product expansion ability; be aware of component AVL and EOL status
Compile product data into rules for developers
Communicate with developers and propose suggestions for on-line store UI, functionalities, and testing
BS EE/IE or related discipline plus 5-7 years' experiences in server or workstation market
Knowledge of server market trend and component life cycle
Knowledge of Database, SQL, and programming

div.p: SupermicroÂ® (NASDAQ: SMCI) is a Top Tier provider of advanced server, storage, and networking solutions for Data Center, Cloud Computing, Enterprise IT, Hadoop/ Big Data, Hyperscale, HPC and IoT/Embedded customers worldwide. We are the #5 fastest growing company among the Silicon Valley Top 50 technology firms. Our unprecedented global expansion has provided us with the opportunity to offer a large number of new positions to the technology community. We seek talented, passionate, and committed engineers, technologists, and business leaders to join us.
